Mod.Name: Cronos WIP
Mod.Author: Hobbitdur & Cronos Team
Mod.Description:
► The most ambitious gameplay mod ◄
This mod will be the reference in gameplay. It will offer many option to enjoy the game. Thus, everyone will find his way of playing: No XP, balanced mod, nightmare mod, ... It provides also simple change for everyone that just want specific change on their vanilla game. With this mod you can make the following modification:
◆ General option ◆ • Language: For the moment only English works, except for gerogero uncensored.
◆ Monster rework (Until Ifrit) ◆ • MonsterRework: Stat rework (Mathematical improved formula and stat change) + AI rework
◆ Cronos Rework ◆ • EncountersRework: Change all encounters in the game • FieldRework: Change fields data like dialog, quest, save point position,.. • MngrpRework: GF refine abilities • ShopRework: Shop rework • StartData: The data you start with • DrawPoint: The draw point magic/quantity • KernelRework: Change magic/item/weapon/abilities/monster attack/... • WIP: For testers
◆ Game fix ◆ • BahamutRareItem: Now actually increase the probability of really rare item. • GerogeroUncensoredMenu: Use the japanese version without color change. • GerogeroUncensoredBattle: Use the japanese version without color change. • TrueRandomness: Use a real random generator. • SquallComputeHit: Make squall fail sometimes !
◆ Quality of life ◆ • DamageCap: All damage can deal up to 65.535 (Eden damage is also cap to 65.535). • NoMagicDepletion: Using magic doesn't decrease your stock. • 255AP: Earn 255 AP after battle. • SaveAnywhere: To be able to save in field. Use at your own risk !
◆ Little gameplay mod ◆ • NoXP: Don't earn any XP at end of battle. • TripleTryhard: Card values changed for a challenge. => To be tested • QueenForest: Queen of cards and Chocobo forest updated to be more convenient => To be tested
◆ DifficultyBalance ◆ • LimitbreakNotRefreshable: Make it impossible to refresh to get your limit-break. • NoGfHeal: No free heal on GF on hotel or by walking? • DamageFormulaUpdate: Change damage formula to have a smoother progression. Don't divide magic monster damage by 2. • JunctionRework: Junction value is linked to level or min between the level and the number of magic junctionned. • DrawRework: Change the draw logic(Either draw more than 9 or draw 100) • 255HitCanFail: Make that weapon can fail even at 255%.
◆ Dev setup ◆ • AddRandomVar: Allow modders to use random numbers in the AI.
◆ Special thanks ◆ • myst6re for Deling tool and RE work • Nihil for AI, stat, encounter rework • Malekith for stat rework • Unicorngoulash for LimitBreakNotRefreshable • AxlRoses for the awesome preview • Maki for his work on RE • Dulca for TripleTryHard and QueenForest • Dangerous Dom for beta testing
Join the team or follow the news by clicking on the link ! Help me to continue this work participating in the Patreon page !
